prodNameC: 因可自體抗體檢測系統
ingredientsDesc:
Materials Provided
6 x         8-well Substrate Slides, (Code: 1107)
8 x         6-well Substrate Slides, (Code: 1136)
1 x 0.5 ml   ANA Positive Control.
1 x 0.5 ml   AMA Positive Control. (Code: 1107, 1136)
1 x 0.5 ml   Negative control.
1 x 5.0 ml   Goat anti-human IgG FITC Conjugate, heavy and light chain specific.
1 x 60 ml    Buffered Diluent.
2 vials      Phosphate Buffered Saline. Dissolve each vial to 1 liter.
1 x 5.0 ml   Mounting Medium.
1 x 1.0 ml   Counterstain
12 x        Coverslips
           Contains <0.1% NaN3
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 間接免疫螢光(Indirect immunofluorescence, IF)抗體檢測組是用於偵測在人類血清中的抗核抗體(antinuclear antibodies, ANA)並加以定量。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5660 多發性自體抗體免疫試驗系統
